title: "Sending Different Data To Particular Clients With tff.federated_select"
excerpt: "This tutorial demonstrates how to implement custom federated algorithms in TFF that require sending different data to different clients. You may already be familiar with tff.federated_broadcast which sends a single server-placed value to all clients."
